body: i’m thankful that miso was in a better mood today after having been in such a bad mood yesterday, and i’m thankful for [this perfect blog post](https://medium.com/the-hairpin/why-not-this-idea-dogs-can-talk-for-25-minutes-per-day-d1a48fa73343).
